column4: hi everyone. Does anyone knows how to pass the password as an argument to telnet?
I need to login automaticly without user intervention
what are you doing with telnet?
its a device for allowing remote access to other devices in a lan
telnet doesn't define protocols for logging in and passwords. how you do that depends on the device you're connecting to
well, then Im in a big problem, jeje
you have to work out what the device wants to hear. for example, a POP3 server wants to hear USER <username> and then PASS <password>
Can I echo the user and password from another process?
i doubt it. when you telnet into the device, what do you see?
a welcome message and a prompt asking for my username
which you then enter. and what happens then?
I need to login automaticly, without typing anything. with a script or something
well, I'll keep trying. thanks for your help
